meanings.definition: The act of decorating with a lattice pattern.
meanings.sent1: She carefully applied latticings to the cake to create a beautiful design.
meanings.sent2: The baker used latticings to decorate the top of the pie.
meanings.sent3: The latticings on the cupcakes made them look like tiny edible fences.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic latticings transformed the plain cookies into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The intricate latticings on the gingerbread house were a delight to behold.

meanings.definition: The material used to create a lattice pattern.
meanings.sent1: The pastry chef selected the finest latticings for the wedding cake.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter chose sturdy latticings for the garden trellis.
meanings.sent3: The latticings in the craft store came in a variety of colors and sizes.
meanings.sent4: The delicate latticings snapped easily under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The intricate latticings added a touch of elegance to the room divider.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a lattice pattern.
meanings.sent1: Her latticings were precise and evenly spaced on the pie crust.
meanings.sent2: The latticings required patience and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The latticings seemed to dance across the surface of the cake.
meanings.sent4: The latticings slowly took shape as she weaved the dough strips together.
meanings.sent5: The latticings added a decorative touch to the lattice pie crust.
